description:
I have two hosts in one vcenter cluster use Distribute VirtualSwitch. Before I launch a instance,i need add port_group  first.

why not add port_group in nova if the port_group is not exist, and how i can do it.
title: vmware with Distribute VirtualSwitch

comments.content:
I have two hosts in one vcenter cluster use Distribute VirtualSwitch. Before I launch a instance,i need add port_group  first.

why not add port_group in nova if the port_group is not exist, and how i can do it.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~2863381314-h

comments.content:
Hi heshang,

Are you requesting support using openstack? If so, please see this link for information on how to get help: https://wiki.openstack.org/wiki/Getting_Started

Are you requesting a feature? If so, can you please explain what you'd like to see behave differently in nova?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~melwitt

comments.content: stackforge / netwoking-vsphere team is working for vDS as a neutron driver.  https://github.com/stackforge/networking-vsphere
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~h-aramaki

comments.content: Please see https://review.openstack.org/154771 for the initial implementation
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~garyk
